original_text: “When you make your neighbor a loan of any sort, you shall not go into his house to collect his pledge.
korean_text: 네 이웃에게 무엇을 꾸어줄 때에 너는 그의 집에 들어가서 전당물을 취하지 말고

sentences.original_text: When you make your neighbor a loan of any sort
sentences.korean_translation: 네 이웃에게 무슨 빚이든지 꾸어 줄 때에

sentences.original_text: you shall not go into his house to collect his pledge.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그 담보물을 받으러 그의 집에 들어가지 말라.
